report.data: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'DMS5' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS5.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Capture' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Capture.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Pipeline' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Pipeline.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'DMS_Data_Package' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM DMS_Data_Package.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 UNION SELECT 'Ontology_Lookup' AS [DBName], COUNT(*) AS Disabled_Indices FROM Ontology_Lookup.sys.indexes WHERE is_disabled = 1 ) LookupQ WHERE Disabled_Indices > 0
